org.apache.spark.mllib.fpm

Class AssociationRules

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.mllib.fpm.AssociationRules
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class AssociationRules
extends Object
implements scala.Serializable
    Generates association rules from a RDD[FreqItemset[Item}. This method only generates association rules which have a single item as the consequent.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      static class  AssociationRules.Rule<Item>
      An association rule between sets of items.
